title: Why are there 18 new Pepsi and Coke machines beside GoGas on South College?  18 seems extreme.  In addition, why not have a variety of brands if you need 18? They are all new so it seems very intentional to need all 18 but I can\'t figure why there are so many.  I\'ve never seen anyone use them.  Thoughts?
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.
